name: Ing. Miroslav Haltuf
goal:
H-Comp Consulting is a group of experts with professional approach to every issue that needs to be dealt with.

Currently we have two full-time employees, about 15 experienced experts on contract (as possible according to Czech laws), who are involved in many European and national programmes in research and innovations in transport, logistics, intelligent transport systems, information technologies, and other fields related to transport, modern methods of project management, and process engineering.

We cooperate on many projects and development tasks, but we also work with our own ideas and thoughts. We are active on European scale, which is illustrated by our activities in projects, and by our involvement in international organizations. That is also reflected in our publishing and presenting activity.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: EU research an innovation projects, interoperability matters in transport, IT development for transport, ITS, digital agenda for transport and cyber-security.
